snippet.title: Sam & Max Save The World - Remastered!
snippet.description:
Now available for Nintendo Switch, Xbox, PlayStation, Steam, and GOG: http://skunkapegames.com/samandmax
Sam & Max Season One is back, spit-shined so clean you can see your face in it.
